2201.subject: CST
2201.descrlong:
Examines venture formation and growth following completion of a business plan. Focuses on ongoing marketing, decision making, and accounting and financial management. Students examine startup and growth management issues faced by real-life ventures and meet with entrepreneurs, small business lawyers and accountants, and investors. Students also receive assistance in approaching potential sources of capital and other resources. (Offered fall semester.) (Cross listed under MIT and BUS.)

(Prereq: BUS 307)
